name: Ads from the Old Days Quiz | Marketing | 10 Questions

questions.text: This car company claimed to have 'a better idea'.
questions.explanation:
Ford.

	'Ford has a better idea' was the pitch.

questions.text: This vehicle 'let the good times roll'.
questions.explanation:
Kawasaki.

	'Kawasaki lets the good times roll'.

questions.text: This cigarette 'tastes good like a cigarettes should'.
questions.explanation:
Winston.

	They kidded around about the bad grammar later.

questions.text: This is 'the one beer to have when you're having more than one'.
Who called itself the 'king of beers'?
'You expect more from' this oil company 'and you get it'.
This beverage called itself the 'real thing'.

questions.explanation:
Pepsodent.

	You'll wonder where the yellow went when you brush your teeth with pepsodent'. Ipana was Bucky Beaver.
